p: The study area is a broad saltmarsh at the eastern Chongming Island (Dongtan) ( Fig. 1), the largest wetland in the Yangtze River Estuary of China. The shallow open waters, mudflats, and saltmarshes in Dongtan make an important habitat for shorebirds [3] and serve as an important stopover for migratory birds on the East Asian-Australian Flyway [16].
